import Item from './item' import React from 'react' import AnimationForFilter from '../utils/animation-for-filter' import { items } from '../utils/product-items' import { pagination } from '../firebase/connect' export default function Products(){ var numbers = [] function intToChar(integer) { return String.fromCharCode(integer) } function handdleClick(e, value){ console.log(intToChar(value)) console.log(value) pagination(intToChar(value)) } function amountOfPagination(){ for(var i = 1; i <= Math.ceil(items.length / 2); i++){ numbers.push( handdleClick(e, numbers.length + 1)}>{i}) } console.log(numbers) return numbers } return (

SHOP ALL

FILTER BY

{amountOfPagination()}
 ) }
